timeOpen.description: Unix timestamp for when registration opens. Set to 0 to disable enforcing open time

timeClose.description: Unix timestamp for when registration closes. Set to 0 to disable enforcing close of registration

timeConfirm.description: Unix timestamp for when confirmation closes. Set to 0 to disable enforcing close of confirmation

enableWhitelist.description: Enable or disable the email whitelist

whitelistedEmails.description: List of enabled email domains. Ignored if enableWhitelist is false.

waitlistText.value: You have been placed on the waitlist!
waitlistText.description: Email sent to participants who were placed on the waitlist

acceptanceText.value: You have been accepted to TartanHacks!
acceptanceText.description: Email sent to participants who were accepted to the event

confirmationText.value: You have been confirmed for TartanHacks!
confirmationText.description: Email sent to participants who confirmed attendance to the event

allowMinors.description: Whether or not to allow minors to register for the event
